Module com.example.sudoku
Package com.example.sudoku.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudoku.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Class representing the controller for the Sudoku game. This class handles the game logic, user interactions, and updating the game state in the user interface. It manages the Sudoku board, user inputs, and helps the player with hints.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Lady Vanessa Matabanchoy

    • getNodeFromGridPane

      public javafx.scene.Node getNodeFromGridPane(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, int col, int row)
      Retrieves a node from the GridPane at the specified column and row.
      Parameters:
      gridPane - the GridPane from which to retrieve the node.
      col - the column index of the node.
      row - the row index of the node.
      Returns:
